# Basics 

Consider the following partially linear model:

$$
Y = \alpha D + g(X) + \epsilon
$$

$$
D = m(X) + v
$$

where

$Y$ :

:   Outcome of interest

$D$ :

:   Treatment or policy variable of interest

$X$ :

:   High-dimensional vector of control variables

$\epsilon, v$ : 

:   Error terms

$m, g$ : 

:   Unknown "nuisance" functions
